channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024030142
item.description:
Report X-2024030142

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-04
  • City: KENAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A PACKAGE FROM OREGON TO ALASKA MARKED AS CONTAINING CELLULAR ACCESSORIES WAS OUT FOR DELIVERY IN KENAI. THE DRIVER PICKED UP THE BOX AND CONTENTS OF THE PACKAGE SPILLED TO THE TRUCK FLOOR. PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED BACK TO THE UPS FACILITY AND INSPECTION REVEALED VARIOUS CELLULAR ACCESSORIES ALONG WITH EIGHT ACOUSTIX TRUE WIRELESS AUDIOBUDS + WITH CHARGING CASE INCLUDED. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN ON UPS AIRCRAFT FROM ONT TO ANC AND ANC TO ENA.

item.title: Report X-2024030093
item.description:
Report X-2024030093

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-04
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (1) 3.57 LITER JUG OF CLOROX PRO GERMICIDAL BLEACH CONCENTRATE LEAKING FROM A LOOSE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
